title: Business, Communication and Design | Singapore Institute of Technology

meta.description: Learn ways to create value and drive change in your organisation through SITLEARN's Business, Communication and Design courses.

text_lines: Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses
Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses
Innovation is the heart of business progress. Learn creative ways to create value and drive change in your organisation.

Our industry-relevant curriculum will help you to adapt to rapidly changing business models and be future-ready in your field of expertise. And with growing demand for talent with people-centric skills and service-oriented mindsets, our communication and design courses will future-proof you in your career.

“This course broadened my perspectives on the various eye-opening possibilities of future technologies such as those shown in sci-fi films. I have learned that no idea should be turned down as failure is the key to success for a great invention.”
Attended DSI6301 Design for Future Technologies
Learn mentorship fundamentals and communication skills to foster effective communication and professional growth, empowering mentees.
Green Transformation with Sustainability Excellence Associate (SEA) and B Corp Certification Process
Master sustainable business practices to boost operational performance, focusing on SEA and B Corp certifications for long-term growth and resilience.
Leadership and Communication, Business Management, Sustainability, Energy Efficiency
Residential Interior Design Course– Design for Interiors (Basic)
Learn interior design fundamentals, including themes, concepts and terminologies to improve effective communication and project outcomes.
Learn to communicate confidently, deliver impactful presentations, and engage diverse audiences with clarity through practical exercises and expert guidance.
Navigating Change in the Age of Transformation
Learn foundational change management principles, strategies, and tools to effectively manage transformation projects, influence stakeholders, and navigate real-world challenges.

Is learning new skills still relevant after 40? This was the question Resendos faced while contemplating taking up a postgraduate certificate course at SIT. His decision to constantly upskill himself shaped his entrepreneurial journey.
Business Management, Design Innovation, Career Growth and Transition
Redefining Thinking and Learning at SkillsFuture Festival

The annual SkillsFuture Festival to promote lifelong learning was hosted by the Singapore University of Technology and Design (SUTD) this year on 23 July. Riding on the theme of ‘Design for the Future Economy’, the single-day event featured 53 learning workshops and talks, with SIT faculty staff sharing their expert insights on thinking and learning.
Design Innovation, Leadership and Communication, Health Sciences

We look forward to journeying with you on your path of lifelong learning. You can manage your preferences or unsubscribe at any time through the links provided in our communications. To learn more about how SIT protects your personal data, you may refer to SIT's Personal Data Protection Policy

Exciting news! We are introducing new micro-credentials in Electrical and Electronic Engineering & Infrastructure and Systems Engineering. Be among the first to know by registering your interest today!
SIT reserves the right to make changes to published course information, including dates, times, venues, fees and instructors without prior notice.
Singapore Institute of Technology. All Rights Reserved.

Business, Communication and Design
Innovation is the heart of business progress. Learn creative ways to create value and drive change in your organisation.
Our industry-relevant curriculum will help you to adapt to rapidly changing business models and be future-ready in your field of expertise. And with growing demand for talent with people-centric skills and service-oriented mindsets, our communication and design courses will future-proof you in your career.
“This course broadened my perspectives on the various eye-opening possibilities of future technologies such as those shown in sci-fi films. I have learned that no idea should be turned down as failure is the key to success for a great invention.”

Is learning new skills still relevant after 40? This was the question Resendos faced while contemplating taking up a postgraduate certificate course at SIT. His decision to constantly upskill himself shaped his entrepreneurial journey.

updateCheckboxVal("Interest_BCD");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ENG");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_FCB");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_HSS");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ICT");

    function updateCheckboxVal(attrName) {
        if (attrName) {
            var checkboxName = attrName + "_checkbox";
            var intAttr = document.getElementsByName(attrName);
            var intCheckbox = document.getElementsByName(checkboxName);
            if (intCheckbox && intAttr) {
                intAttr[0].value = intCheckbox[0].checked;
            }
        }
    }

    function updatesUponSubmit() {
        var checkboxes = document.querySelectorAll('[data-group="check-box-group"]');
        var boxSelected = false;
        for (var i = 0, l = checkboxes.length; i < l; i++) {
            if (checkboxes[i].checked) {
                boxSelected = true;
                break;
            }
        }
        if (boxSelected) {
            var gmt8Date = new Date().toLocaleDateString("en-US", { timeZone: "Asia/Singapore" });
            const now = new Date().toUTCString();
            var optinEmailDate = document.getElementsByName("OptinEmailDate");
            var createdDate = document.getElementsByName("CreatedDate");
            var formSubmissionDate = document.getElementsByName("FormSubmissionDate");
            var primaryKey = document.getElementsByName("PrimaryKey");
            var getEmail = document.getElementById("email").value;
            var getWebsource = document.getElementById("websourceID").value;

            optinEmailDate[0].value = now;
            createdDate[0].value = now;
            formSubmissionDate[0].value = now;
            primaryKey[0].value = getEmail + getWebsource + gmt8Date;
			
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_BCD");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ENG");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_FCB");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_HSS");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ICT");
			
        } else {
            var checkboxes = document.querySelector('.error-message');
            checkboxes.classList.add('active');
            return false;
        }
    }
